data.title: 12th Annual DC South Asian Film Festival
data.meta_description: Long awaited 12th Annual DC South Asian Film Festival is from Dec 01-03 In Person and Dec 04-18 Virtual. A platform to screen South Asian feature, short, and documentary films from all over the world. The three days film festival includes In Conversation with World Renowned Director Jamil Dehlavi, Master Class in Acting by Director and Actor Sarmad Khoosat and Industry Panel with Hollywood Professionals on Mainstream or Your Own Content? All Films have English subtitles., powered by Localist, the Community Event Platform
data.text: Long awaited 12th Annual DC South Asian Film Festival is from Dec 01-03 In Person and Dec 04-18 Virtual. A platform to screen South Asian feature, short, and documentary films from all over the world. The three days film festival includes In Conversation with World Renowned Director Jamil Dehlavi, Master Class in Acting by Director and Actor Sarmad Khoosat and Industry Panel with Hollywood Professionals on Mainstream or Your Own Content? All Films have English subtitles.
